Operations

Class AreaDoubler

  • java.lang.Object
    • Operations.AreaDoubler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FigureVisitor

    public class AreaDoubler
extends java.lang.Object
implements FigureVisitor
    The class AreaDoubler is an operation class used to double the area of a Figure. It has a method visit for any Figure subclass in order to use the Visitor pattern. The result is always a new scaled Figure. This class implements the FigureVisitor interface in order to use the Visitor pattern.
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Ramon de Llano Chamorro
    See Also:
    FigureVisitor

        public void visit(Drawing drawing)
        The visit method for Drawing.
        Specified by:
        visit in interface FigureVisitor
        Parameters:
